item.description: 用php+mysql写一个刷新页面显示不同的内容 <? $conn=mysql_connect("localhost","user","pwd"); $sql="select * from tab where 1"; result=mysql_db_query("database_name",sql); row_num=mysql_num_rows(result); rand=rand(0,row_num); mysql_data_seek(result, rand); row=mysql_fetch_assoc(result); echo "<pre>"; print_r($row); echo "/<pre>"; ?>
